snippet: Industry experts said the biography of Steve Jobs could easily sell millions of copies in print, audio and e-book editions.
lead_paragraph: Industry experts said the biography of Steve Jobs could easily sell millions of copies in print, audio and e-book editions.

headline.main: Book Business Sees a Bonanza in a Forthcoming Biography
headline.print_headline: Book Business Sees a Bonanza in a Forthcoming Biography
headline.seo: Book Business Has Big Hopes for Biography of Steve Jobs
